info.name: HRMS Backend API
info.description: Postman collection for testing HRMS Backend API endpoints

request.description: Required: provide `month` and `year` (we will create/find the payroll run). `gross`/`net` default to 0 if omitted. Attach file using key `file`. The response includes `month` and `year` fields.
Returns payroll run with status and fields: completedAt and errorLog (nullable)
Creates a statutory deduction. Send `rate` (number), e.g. 10 for 10%. The collection accepts `percentage` as an alias and will be mapped to `rate`.
